#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, hh, mm;
	double v, v2, v3, v4;

	scanf("%d", &t);

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d %d", &hh, &mm );

		if( ( hh >= 0 ) && ( hh <= 23 ) && ( mm >= 0 ) && ( mm <= 59 ) ) {
		
			hh = hh % 12;

			v = ( (double)mm * 5.5 );
			v2 = 30.0*(double)hh;
			v3 = fabs(v - v2);
			if( v3 >= 180 )	
				v4 = 360.0 - v3;
			else
				v4 = v3;

			printf("%.1lf\n", v4 );
		}
		else 
			printf("Invalid Time\n");
	} 

	return 0;
}
